actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $1,500 ($3,000 for joint returns) of the interest earned on savings accounts in banks, savings associations, or credit unions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.
